scripts.test: npm run test-basic && npm run test-node && npm run test-shell && npm run test-use-shell
scripts.test-node: echo "\033[0;32mCustom Env File Usage\033[0m" && ../node_modules/.bin/env-cmd -f ./.env-file node index.js
scripts.test-shell: echo "\033[0;32mCustom Env File Usage with SH\033[0m" && ../node_modules/.bin/env-cmd -f ./.env-file sh ./env.sh
scripts.test-use-shell: echo "\033[0;32mCustom Rnv File Usage with Use Shell\033[0m" && ../node_modules/.bin/env-cmd -f ./.env-file --use-shell "node index.js && sh ./env.sh"
